title: Version Update Introduction
content:
ðŸ“Œ New hotkey: You can now press Alt+Space to summon the hotkey and find files more easily; press ESC or the hotkey again to hide.
ðŸ“Œ New system tray: Closing the app now minimizes it to the system tray in the bottom-right corner. You can find the osai icon there and right-click to exit. While minimized to tray, you can still summon the hotkey anytime.
ðŸ“Œ Expanded search categories: You can now search for folders and applications in the search bar summoned by the hotkey.
